name: Batman Socks 3 Pack
details: Add some superhero fun to his sock drawer with these Batman themed, cotton rich socks.

name: Metallic Textured Slip Dress
details: Rock the room in this high-shine metallic slip dress that features all the right on-trend touches for easy-chic flair that delivers on style and comfort.

details: Perfect for endless summer days, these Bermuda shorts feature five pockets with a secure button fastener and an adjustable waistband for all-day comfort.

name: Lightning Knit
details: Let your little one bolt into those cooler months with comfort. This season we're all about soft tones and snug textures. 100% Cotton.
